data.message: Hope your new messenger app is a complete failure!.. your users are sick of being forced against their will to accept whatever you want to shove at us. I..for one..will NEVER get your stupid app even if it means I NEVER chat again! And I hope the rest of the world will join me in this! You are forcing it on people to spy on them and most people don't even realize it! Read ur terms of service agreement people!!!
